tools.name: VexFlow
tools.description: A powerful music notation rendering library for web applications.

tools.name: Tailwind CSS via CDN
tools.description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.  Instead of installing via npm, I am referencing Tailwind through the CDN using an inline script tag pointing to cdn.tailwindcss.com allowing me to prototype without a build step.

tools.name: Tone.js
tools.description: A Web Audio framework for creating interactive music in the browser.

tools.name: SpeechSynthesis API
tools.description: Browser-native API for converting text to spoken voice.
